SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication

Class TCPClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication.TCPClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection
public class TCPClientConnection extends Object implements ClientConnection
Handles the TCP connection: opens it, closes it, handles notifications, receives and sends messages from and to the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    closeConnection()
    Closes the TCP connection, closes the executorService, and stops listening to notifications.
    private Boolean
    dispatchNotification(String json)
    Handles the received message by calling the appropriate view method, notifications related to the game are called synchronously and in order (queued in a single thread pool executor) ping is called asynchronously, to prevent notification handler from causing excessive ping delay
    void
    openConnection()
    Opens the TCP connection, initializes the executorService, and starts listening to notifications.
    private void
    sendStringToServer(String json)
    Sends a message to the server, it locks the writeLock
    void
    sendToServer(String json)
    Calls sendStringToServer
    private Void
    startNotificationHandler()
    Listens for messages and dispatches them, unless interrupted this process is done synchronously, so that messages received from the server hare handled in order of arrival

  • Method Details

    • openConnection

      public void openConnection() throws ClientConnectionException
      Opens the TCP connection, initializes the executorService, and starts listening to notifications.
      Specified by:
      openConnection in interface ClientConnection
      Throws:
      ClientConnectionException - if an error occurs while opening the TCP client connection.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws ClientConnectionException
      Closes the TCP connection, closes the executorService, and stops listening to notifications.
      Specified by:
      closeConnection in interface ClientConnection
      Throws:
      ClientConnectionException - if an error occurs while closing the TCP client connection.

    • sendToServer

      public void sendToServer(String json)
      Calls sendStringToServer
      Parameters:

    • sendStringToServer

      private void sendStringToServer(String json)
      Sends a message to the server, it locks the writeLock
      Parameters:
      json - the message to be sent to the server

    • startNotificationHandler

      private Void startNotificationHandler()
      Listens for messages and dispatches them, unless interrupted this process is done synchronously, so that messages received from the server hare handled in order of arrival

    • dispatchNotification

      private Boolean dispatchNotification(String json)
      Handles the received message by calling the appropriate view method, notifications related to the game are called synchronously and in order (queued in a single thread pool executor) ping is called asynchronously, to prevent notification handler from causing excessive ping delay
      Parameters:
      json - the notification string received from the server
      Returns:
      true if the response has been handled correctly by the view, false otherwise
